results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከአላህም ጋር ሌላን አምላክ አትግገዛ፤ ከሚቀጡት ትኾናለህና፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከምእምናንም ለተከተሉህ ሰዎች ክንፍህን ዝቅ አድርግ፤ (ልዝብ ኹን)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
